long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🥚🔫 Shell Shockers is an egg-citing online multiplayer first-person shooter! Get cracking with these egg-streme controls:

🕹 Movement: WASD/Arrow keys
🎯 Aim: Move your mouse
🔫 Shoot: Left-click to unleash egg-treme firepower
↺ Reload: Press 'R' to egg-load your weapon
🔀 Swap Weapons: Use 1-4 keys for egg-splosive variety
⬆ Jump: Press Spacebar to egg-scape danger
💬 Chat: Hit Enter to egg-spress yourself!

Game Modes:

🥚 Free For All: Crack eggs and score points solo!
🔴🔵 Teams: Join forces with teammates to crush the opposition!
🍳 Capture the Spatula: Battle for glory as you snatch the enemy's spatula!

👾🎮 Play more egg-citing games on the top-left menu! Get ready to egg-sperience egg-streme fun! 🐣🔥
